/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the white buildings that line the street. These buildings, with their traditional Chinese architectural style, add a touch of history and culture to the scene. The street itself is lined with trees, their green leaves adding a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. Cars can be seen driving on the road, their movement creating a dynamic element in the otherwise static scene. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in urban landscapes. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives the viewer a sense of being part of the scene.
